nodes.text: Zakuulan wine was a type of expensive wine produced on the Eternal Empire capital world of Zakuul. 400 bottles of Zakuulan wine were ordered for the Grand Festival of Empress Vaylin in 3630 BBY.
Zakuulan wine is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VI: The Dragon's Maw".
